cause.description:
Workshops for Youth and Families (WYF) is an award-winning nonprofit organization committed to youth development. Through education and nurturing, WYF and its staff believe that youth can CHOOSE to lead healthier, happier lives.
The programs provided by WYF engage youth in a safe, caring and personal experience where they gain a greater understanding of their personal strengths, develop skills, and then practice the learned skills among other motivated youth. This positive and uplifting seminar BUILDS CHARACTER AND INSPIRES CONFIDENCE.
This organization is essential to building a healthy community... the youth are our future! To learn more about this organization, visit www.orho.org or contact WYF at:
3634 N. Drinkwater Blvd. Scottsdale, AZ 85251 Ph (480) 882-6011 Fax (480) 882-4668 information@orho.org
1. We must prevent at-risk behaviors in our youth!
2. Building a healthy community is essential.
3. Youth are our future!
cause.mission: To foster personal leadership and resiliency skills in youth and families through programs that inspire positive growth and change.
cause.name: Workshops for Youth and Families
